name: 6th Mergers and Acquisitions in the Technology Sector Conference
content: Topics Include: Berlin Tech and Venture Capital Scene Where the sky gets cloudy - dealing with financing and other challenges Data in tech: autonomous vehicles Fireside chat: perspectives of a unicorn founder in Germany Green/ climate investments and M and A in the tech sector Metaverse and tech, lawyers and M and A The present and future of representations and warranties in the tech M and A transactions Al in M and A transactions (data, data protection and the Al Act) 15 hot topics in round table format Date and Time: On Thu, Mar 23, 2023 ( 8:30 AM) - Fri, Mar 24, 2023 ( 2:00 PM) Venue details: The Ritz-Carlton, Berlin, 3 Potsdamer Platz, Berlin, Berlin, 10785, Germany Prices: IBA Member (before 10 February): EUR 1105.00, IBA Non-member (before 10 February): EUR 1280.00, IBA Member (after 10 February): EUR 1220.00, IBA Non-member (after 10 February): EUR 1395.00
